getObjectProperty (getObjectProperty.html)

Get a property value within an object. Can retrieve from deeply within the object using dot-notation.

Paramaters

  • obj { object } - The object to a property value of.
  • property { string } - The property to retrieve (use dot-notation to get from deep within object).
  • defaultValue { mixed } - The default value to return if property not found or undefined.

Returns

{ mixed } -
